componentDescription: Enables selection from a group of toggle switches.

shape.description: Optional shape prop to define the shape of toggle elements.

typeValues: array of items defining each toggle in the group
items.description: Mandatory array of items defining each toggle in the group.

variant.description: Optional variant prop to specify the visual style of the toggle group.

typeValues: any theme color identifier as string
colorScheme.description: Optional colorScheme prop for theming the toggle group.

onToggleChange.description: Optional callback function that fires when the active toggle changes, providing the IDs of active toggles.

activeToggles.description: Array storing the IDs of active toggles within the group.

setActiveToggles.description: Function to update the active toggle states.
